vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.11;
son of: Chelub (H3620);
father of: Eshton (H0850)
§ Mehir = "price"
son of Chelub the brother of Shuah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   precio, renta, alquiler; (2)   hijo de Quelub; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米黑 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "價值"
書哈的兄弟基綠的兒子 (代上4:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米黑 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "价值"
书哈的兄弟基绿的儿子 (代上4:11)
